companyDescription: Code intelligence company that builds tools for developers to search and navigate code across entire codebases

businessFunctions.description: Transforms community feedback into actionable insights for product development and increases responsiveness to user needs
Processes community feedback, creates competitor sentiment dashboards, and manages open-source community engagement

implementation.approach: Upload PDFs to Claude Projects and generate structured reports

quantitativeMetrics.context: Claude gets reports 95% of the way there before final refinements
quantitativeMetrics.source: Claude gets it 95% of the way there, and then our team adds final refinements before sending the report to the product managers

qualitativeBenefits.description: Freed up employees to focus on high-value tasks and take action on insights quickly
qualitativeBenefits.source: By automating much of their feedback process, Claude has freed up employees to focus on high-value tasks and take action on insights quickly, increasing overall productivity

qualitativeBenefits.description: Improved customer satisfaction and retention through faster issue resolution
qualitativeBenefits.source: This approach has contributed to improved customer satisfaction and retention through faster issue resolution

qualitativeBenefits.description: Makes work more strategic and enables teams to create higher impact work
qualitativeBenefits.source: This makes our work more strategic and enables our teams to create higher impact work

qualitativeBenefits.description: Created feedback loop between community input and product development ensuring products evolve with user needs
qualitativeBenefits.source: Claude has also created a feedback loop between community input and product development. This cycle ensures that Sourcegraph's products continue to evolve in line with user needs and expectations
